name: Necrozma GX
author: 5ban Graphics

abilities.name: Light’s End
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from {C} Pokémon.

attacks.name: Prismatic Burst
attacks.effect: Discard all {P} Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 60 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Black Ray GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 100 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX. This damage isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
